title: Asia: a continental overview
brief_description: Examines the principle physical regions of Asia in terms of natural resources and human use. Gives a picture of the wide range of living conditions on this largest and most populous of the continents and emphasizes the many changes taking place in centuries-old patterns of life. No other credits available.
